caption.p: Germ tube growth after two hours of activation with fetal bovine serum with addition of ( A) Control without essential oil; ( B) Essential oil at a concentration of 8.0 mg/mL, which resulted in a decreased ability of the yeast to develop a germ tube; ( C) Essential oil at a concentration of 0.5 mg/mL, with many yeast having normal germ tube growth, but some having poor growth. Arrows indicate the germ tube growth. Microphotographs were taken at 40Ã—.
